DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to the evaluation of a medical device._A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria._A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._Indicator determining determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the evaluation of a medical device._A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria._A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Medical device - any machinery designed to aid diagnostic and medical therapies. Medical device has to be designed with rigorous safety standards. There are several basic types of medical devices: life support equipment used to maintain a patient's body functions; therapeutic equipment; monitors and detectors to measure the indexes of a patient's state; imagine machines and laboratory equipment used with diagnostic and status monitoring purposes. In insurance parlance, the term is usually synonymous with assistive device, although it may include medical supplies.

Concepts.definition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.

Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
